title: Story Base Component
description: Provides component property definitions for components that are usable within a story.

spacingAfter.description: The spacing to add after the component.  The unit is 1/10 of the height of the layer.

spacingBefore.description: The spacing to add before the component.  The unit is 1/10 of the height of the layer.

xOffset.description: The amount to offset the component along the x-axis.  The unit is 1/10 of the height of the layer.

yOffset.description: The amount to offset the component along the y-axis.  The unit is 1/10 of the height of the layer.

opacity.description: The opacity of the component, as a float.

rotationDegrees.description: The amount to rotate the component, in degrees.  Positive values indicate clockwise rotation, negative values indicate counter-clockwise rotation.

scale.description: The scale of the component, as a float, where 1.0 represents the component at its natural size.
